pages.text: Chimney is a kind of kitchen facility, each structure consists of chimney flues and a chimney pot. Like other facilities, there are variants of different $(l:intro/kitchen_materials)materials$(/l).
Chimney flues extend the length of the chimney. They can be either long or short.
Chimney pots must be placed on the top of the chimney structures, it doesn't need to be of the same material with chimney flue
Chimney structures can only extend vertically, and there should not be anything that lies between the chimney and where the smoke come from.
Soot accumulates when the chimney pot is in use, and can be collected with a shovel at the chimney pot. They are useful in dye crafting.
